title: UNABLE TO LOG IN
body: I CANT LOG IN ANY OF MY COMPUTERS, INTERNET IS WORKING FINE. IT IS TELLING ME UNABLE TO CONNECT TO THE AUTHENTICATION SERVICE. I SUBMITTED TICKETS, THE GUIDES DID NOT HELP, AND I USED HEXTECH FIXER THINGY. NOTHING IS HELPING!!! I NEEED HELP PLEASE HELP!

replies.body: Have you tried adjusting a couple of your network settings to try and get a smoother link with our login servers yet? If you're not sure how to update your port forwarding and DNS settings be sure to check out those steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as well as some other good basic troubleshooting steps. If that doesn't help, keep responding with the tech guys in your ticket and they'll be able to dig much deeper there!
hasnt helped still need help, i sent like 3 tickets no response
